pages.text: The Tray is a small block that is capable of holding up to 9 items. It may be placed in the world facing any direction, providing a simple way of storing items. Use right click to insert or remove items.$(br2)The Tray also works as a filter for blocks like the Gravity Block and the Setter.
To filter items, place a Tray adjacent to the block you wish to filter. Then choose between Black Listing (darker background) and White Listing (lighter background) and insert items into it.
